verses.text: \w One|strong="H3808"\w* day, \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* said \w to|strong="H1245"\w* Ruth, “\w My|strong="H1245"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w should|strong="H1323"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w to|strong="H1245"\w* secure \w a|strong="H3068"\w* home \w for|strong="H1245"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w where|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w happy|strong="H3190"\w* \w and|strong="H1323"\w* prosperous?

\w Is|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w*, \w with|strong="H1961"\w* whose \w girls|strong="H5291"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* relative \w of|strong="H1637"\w* ours?

Tonight \w he|strong="H5704"\w* is \w going|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* winnow barley \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* threshing-floor. \w So|strong="H7760"\w* \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w anoint|strong="H5480"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* best \w clothes|strong="H8071"\w* \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w go|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* threshing-floor. \w But|strong="H5921"\w* \w do|strong="H3381"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5921"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H3045"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w has|strong="H3045"\w* \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* eating \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w lies|strong="H7901"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w*, \w mark|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w lies|strong="H7901"\w*. \w Go|strong="H1540"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w*, \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* \w feet|strong="H4772"\w*, \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.”
“\w I|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* say.” Ruth said \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* she \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* threshing-floor \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w just|strong="H3605"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w mother-in-law|strong="H2545"\w* \w told|strong="H6680"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7901"\w* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* \w had|strong="H1162"\w* finished eating \w and|strong="H8354"\w* \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w* \w and|strong="H8354"\w* \w was|strong="H3820"\w* \w in|strong="H7901"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w happy|strong="H3190"\w* mood, \w he|strong="H8354"\w* \w went|strong="H1540"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w* \w at|strong="H7097"\w* \w the|strong="H1540"\w* \w end|strong="H7097"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H1540"\w* \w heap|strong="H6194"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w grain|strong="H6194"\w*. Then Ruth came \w quietly|strong="H3909"\w* \w and|strong="H8354"\w* \w uncovered|strong="H1540"\w* \w his|strong="H1540"\w* \w feet|strong="H4772"\w* \w and|strong="H8354"\w* \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w*.

\w At|strong="H1961"\w* \w midnight|strong="H2677"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* man \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w startled|strong="H2729"\w* \w and|strong="H3915"\w* \w turned|strong="H1961"\w* over, \w and|strong="H3915"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* woman \w lying|strong="H7901"\w* \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w feet|strong="H4772"\w*!

“\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w are|strong="H4310"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*?” \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said. “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* servant,” \w she|strong="H3588"\w* answered, “\w Spread|strong="H6566"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* cloak \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* servant, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H4310"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w near|strong="H5921"\w* \w relative|strong="H1350"\w*.”

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* said, “\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* blest \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*. \w You|strong="H1288"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w shown|strong="H3190"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* greater \w favor|strong="H2617"\w* \w now|strong="H3212"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H1288"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1115"\w* \w followed|strong="H3212"\w* \w young|strong="H1115"\w* \w men|strong="H6223"\w*, \w whether|strong="H4480"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* \w or|strong="H4480"\w* \w rich|strong="H6223"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w no|strong="H6213"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* ask, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w town|strong="H8179"\w* \w knows|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w virtuous|strong="H2428"\w* \w woman|strong="H1323"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* true \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3426"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* \w relative|strong="H1350"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w another|strong="H1571"\w* man \w nearer|strong="H7138"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Stay|strong="H3885"\w* \w here|strong="H5704"\w* \w tonight|strong="H3915"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* perform \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* duty \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w*, \w well|strong="H2896"\w*, \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H2896"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1242"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* perform \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* duty \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w*, \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w surely|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*, \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1242"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w*. \w Lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H6965"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* \w at|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* \w feet|strong="H4772"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w before|strong="H5704"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3588"\w* \w could|strong="H3045"\w* \w recognize|strong="H5234"\w* \w her|strong="H3045"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* Boaz said, “\w No|strong="H3045"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w* must \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* woman came \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* threshing-floor.”

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* also said, “\w Bring|strong="H3051"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cloak|strong="H4304"\w* \w which|strong="H5892"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5892"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w hold|strong="H7896"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.” \w So|strong="H5921"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* held \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w while|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* poured \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* measures \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w laid|strong="H7896"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* shoulders. Then \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w went|strong="H5892"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w When|strong="H6213"\w* Ruth \w came|strong="H1323"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w mother-in-law|strong="H2545"\w*, Naomi asked, “\w Is|strong="H4310"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*?” \w Then|strong="H6213"\w* Ruth \w told|strong="H5046"\w* Naomi \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H6213"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*.

“\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* these \w six|strong="H8337"\w* measures of \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*,” \w she|strong="H3588"\w* said, “\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* go \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w mother-in-law|strong="H2545"\w* \w empty-handed|strong="H7387"\w*.”

“\w Wait|strong="H3427"\w* \w quietly|strong="H8252"\w*, \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*.” Naomi \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w Until|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w affair|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* turn \w out|strong="H3045"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H5307"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w rest|strong="H8252"\w* \w unless|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w settles|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*.”
